name: Pixel Tank (itch)
description:
Game about shooting aliens with pixelated tank. Nothing less , nothing more.

System requirements (Lowest graphics):

  • GPU: NVidia RTX 2080 or better
  • CPU: Intel Core I7-8700K or better
  • RAM: 8GB (32GB reccomended)
  • Operating system:  Windows 10 64bit

Winner of 0 game of the year awards!

Features:

  • Outstanding 2D graphics
  • Breathtaking enviroment
  • Aliens and tank
  • Main menu

Controls:

  • turn: Down Arrow
  • shoot: Numpad Enter

(All jokes aside, I hated working on this, so I finished it asap, a lot got scrapped and looks like prototype)
